description: p(n), positive part of n when n=p(n)-q(n) with p(n), q(n), p(n)+q(n) in A005836, integers written without 2 in base 3.
comments: The graphs of p(n), q(n) are fractals; the graph of p(n)+q(n) is Sierpi≈Ñski-like.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
author: Claude Lenormand (claude.lenormand(AT)free.fr), Apr 02 2001
